00228 
00229   SET_USE_WINFONTS( TRUE );
00230   SET_WINFONT( giSubTitleWinFont ); 
00231   Color = FROMRGB( 255, 255, 255 );
00232   SetWinFontForeColor( giSubTitleWinFont, &Color );
00233       PrintWinFont( FRAME_BUFFER, giSubTitleWinFont, 10, 100, L"Font %s initialized", gzFontName );
00234       InvalidateScreen();
00235       RefreshScreen( NULL );
00236   SET_USE_WINFONTS( FALSE );
00237 
00238 #endif
00239 
00240       return( TRUE );

00242 
00243 void ShutdownFonts( )
00244 {
00245       UnloadFont( gpLargeFontType1 );
00246       UnloadFont( gpSmallFontType1 );
00247       UnloadFont( gpTinyFontType1 );
00248       UnloadFont( gp12PointFont1 );
00249       UnloadFont( gpClockFont);
00250   UnloadFont( gpCompFont);
00251       UnloadFont( gpSmallCompFont);
00252       UnloadFont( gp10PointRoman);
00253       UnloadFont( gp12PointRoman);
00254       UnloadFont( gp14PointSansSerif);
00255 //    UnloadFont( gpMilitaryFont1);
00256       UnloadFont( gp10PointArial);
00257   UnloadFont( gp10PointArialBold);
00258       UnloadFont( gp14PointArial);
00259   UnloadFont( gpBlockyFont);
00260       UnloadFont( gp12PointArialFixedFont );
00261       #if defined( JA2EDITOR ) && defined( ENGLISH )
00262             UnloadFont( gpHugeFont );
00263       #endif
00264 
00265   // ATE: Shutdown any win fonts
00266 #ifdef WINFONTS
00267     DeleteWinFont( giSubTitleWinFont );
00268 #endif
00269 }

00271 // Set shades for fonts
00272 BOOLEAN SetFontShade( UINT32 uiFontID, INT8 bColorID )
00273 {
00274       HVOBJECT pFont;
00275 
00276       CHECKF( bColorID > 0 );
00277       CHECKF( bColorID < 16 );
00278 
00279       pFont = GetFontObject( uiFontID );
00280 
00281       pFont->pShadeCurrent = pFont->pShades[ bColorID ];
00282 
00283       return( TRUE );
00284 }
00285 
00286 UINT16 CreateFontPaletteTables(HVOBJECT pObj )
00287 {
00288       UINT32 count;
00289       SGPPaletteEntry Pal[256];
00290 
00291       for( count = 0; count < 16; count++ )
00292       {
00293             if ( (count == 4) && (pObj->p16BPPPalette == pObj->pShades[ count ]) )
00294                   pObj->pShades[ count ] = NULL;
00295             else if ( pObj->pShades[ count ] != NULL )
00296             {
00297                   MemFree( pObj->pShades[ count ] );
00298                   pObj->pShades[ count ] = NULL;
00299             }
00300       }
00301 
00302       // Build white palette
00303       for(count=0; count < 256; count++)
00304       {
00305             Pal[count].peRed=(UINT8)255;
00306             Pal[count].peGreen=(UINT8)255;
00307             Pal[count].peBlue=(UINT8)255;
00308       }
00309 
00310       pObj->pShades[ FONT_SHADE_RED ]=Create16BPPPaletteShaded( pObj->pPaletteEntry, 255, 0, 0, TRUE);
00311       pObj->pShades[ FONT_SHADE_BLUE ]=Create16BPPPaletteShaded( pObj->pPaletteEntry, 0, 0, 255, TRUE);
00312       pObj->pShades[ FONT_SHADE_GREEN ]=Create16BPPPaletteShaded( pObj->pPaletteEntry, 0, 255, 0, TRUE);
00313       pObj->pShades[ FONT_SHADE_YELLOW ]=Create16BPPPaletteShaded( pObj->pPaletteEntry, 255, 255, 0, TRUE);
00314       pObj->pShades[ FONT_SHADE_NEUTRAL ]=Create16BPPPaletteShaded( pObj->pPaletteEntry, 255, 255, 255, FALSE);
00315 
00316       pObj->pShades[ FONT_SHADE_WHITE ]=Create16BPPPaletteShaded( pObj->pPaletteEntry, 255, 255, 255, TRUE);
00317 
00318             
00319       // the rest are darkening tables, right down to all-black.
00320       pObj->pShades[0]=Create16BPPPaletteShaded( pObj->pPaletteEntry, 165, 165, 165, FALSE);
00321       pObj->pShades[7]=Create16BPPPaletteShaded( pObj->pPaletteEntry, 135, 135, 135, FALSE);
00322       pObj->pShades[8]=Create16BPPPaletteShaded( pObj->pPaletteEntry, 105, 105, 105, FALSE);
00323       pObj->pShades[9]=Create16BPPPaletteShaded( pObj->pPaletteEntry, 75, 75, 75, FALSE);
00324       pObj->pShades[10]=Create16BPPPaletteShaded( pObj->pPaletteEntry, 45, 45, 45, FALSE);
00325       pObj->pShades[11]=Create16BPPPaletteShaded( pObj->pPaletteEntry, 36, 36, 36, FALSE);
00326       pObj->pShades[12]=Create16BPPPaletteShaded( pObj->pPaletteEntry, 27, 27, 27, FALSE);
00327       pObj->pShades[13]=Create16BPPPaletteShaded( pObj->pPaletteEntry, 18, 18, 18, FALSE);
00328       pObj->pShades[14]=Create16BPPPaletteShaded( pObj->pPaletteEntry, 9, 9, 9, FALSE);
00329       pObj->pShades[15]=Create16BPPPaletteShaded( pObj->pPaletteEntry, 0, 0, 0, FALSE);
00330 
00331       // Set current shade table to neutral color
00332       pObj->pShadeCurrent=pObj->pShades[4];
00333 
00334       // check to make sure every table got a palette
00335       //for(count=0; (count < HVOBJECT_SHADE_TABLES) && (pObj->pShades[count]!=NULL); count++);
00336       
00337       // return the result of the check
00338       //return(count==HVOBJECT_SHADE_TABLES);
00339       return(TRUE);
00340 }

00342 UINT16    WFGetFontHeight( INT32 FontNum )
00343 {
00344   if ( USE_WINFONTS( ) )
00345   {
00346             // return how many Y pixels we used
00347         return( GetWinFontHeight( L"a\0", GET_WINFONT( ) ) );
00348   }
00349   else
00350   {
00351             // return how many Y pixels we used
00352         return( GetFontHeight( FontNum ) );
00353   }
00354 }
00355 
00356 
00357 INT16 WFStringPixLength( UINT16 *string,INT32 UseFont )
00358 {
00359   if ( USE_WINFONTS( ) )
00360   {
00361             // return how many Y pixels we used
00362         return( WinFontStringPixLength( string, GET_WINFONT( ) ) );
00363   }
00364   else
00365   {
00366             // return how many Y pixels we used
00367         return( StringPixLength( string, UseFont ) );
00368   }
00369 }
